attributes.action: Back Boris Johnson as UK Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
We see horrific media broadcasts where UK Government ministers are being questioned like primary school children and the whole government is being held in huge disrespect at this very important time.

World affairs mean that our Government needs the support of the UK media as well as the country as a whole.  We ask Parliament to back Boris for the good of our nation!
attributes.background: There is a vicious media campaign against our democratically elected PM which is gathering speed and momentum.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked or supported.
